mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post(user_id, board_id, company_id, post_title, post_content) VALUES (#{userID}, #{boardID}, #{companyID}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent});
mapper.select: SELECT post_id as postID, user_id as userID, board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, post_title as postTitle, post_content as postContent, post_register_time as postRegisterTime FROM Post WHERE post_id=${postID};

SELECT post.post_id as postID, post.user_id as userID, post.board_id as boardID, post.company_id as companyID, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_content as postContent, post.post_register_time as postRegisterTime, board.board_name as boardName, users.user_name as userName FROM Post post, Board board, Users users WHERE (users.user_id = post.user_id AND board.board_id = post.board_id)
ORDER BY postRegisterTime DESC;
